website_summaries.verdict: A stylish bottle opener that is easy to mount to any wall.
pros: Faux rustic iron and shiny industrial alloy construction gives the bottle opener a distinct appearance
Can be set up on a wall in a kitchen, bar area, or any other space in just seconds
cons: Bottle opener is decorative but fails to provide the same level of functionality of similar options

customer_reviews.title: Here’s all you need to know: it breaks the bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. All three of them will break the glass at the top of the bottle because they are not properly designed. It grabs the lip of the bottle rather than just the cap. If you are very careful, you can still use it. If not, you will have shards of glass to contend with. I have tried these many different bottle as well. Now they are mere wall decorations that I occasionally use when I’m feeling adventurous. Have lost more than a few beers though. I suggest looking somewhere else. They look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: CSullens

customer_reviews.title: Look good but not functional!
customer_reviews.text: Bottle openers looks good for decoration but the angle they were made is not adequate to open bottles and leads to beverage spill. This is applied to all 4 in the package i received so it might be an issue with the manufacturer casting mold. Sad that they look great but not functional.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B

customer_reviews.title: See picture
customer_reviews.text: None of them will open a bottle. All went in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Breaks glass
customer_reviews.text: Sloppy casting breaks the lip of the bottle off with the cap. Could possibly be filed down (inside of the opener, not the bottle) but I shouldn't have to do that. RIP IPA😭
customer_reviews.author: Quinn In Temecula

customer_reviews.title: Why does it squirt?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these figuring that all bottle openers I’d this type are the same. While it might seem that way, I’ve now mounted two of these and both cause beer to squirt out of the bottle when being opened. It doesn’t happen every time, but it’s at least 80% of the time. Given that I’m usually using them in the back yard, usually by the pool it’s not the end of the world. I can always stick my arm in the pool to wash it off. But it definitely surprises people the first time they use it.
customer_reviews.author: M_P_C

customer_reviews.title: The product description is not accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Mount this on a vertical wall and you will be sprayed with beer. It must be mounted on a wedge that offers at least a 15 degree slope from vertical. Instructions/descriptions are incorrect. This may work on a rustic farmhouse that is near falling over. Thanks for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Cal Halliburton

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but bottles might  break
customer_reviews.text: The seller of this product was great, super fast delivery absolutely no complaints however, the product itself will break 2 bottles at the cap as the dimensions are not great. This might not be the same for everyone so take my rating with a grain of salt. The product looks great but it did break two of my Glass Coke bottles when trying to open.
customer_reviews.author: TBOT

customer_reviews.title: worked great for crafts to gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price for these little bottle openers. I use them to make man cave hanging bottle opener. Using barn wood I dropped it up to look even older and made a box around the bottom so when a bottle is opened it would drop into the box. On the backboard I attached these openers and would paint a saying underneath it. Such as; Tops off ... Bottoms up
customer_reviews.author: Robin N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but there are cheaper ones elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, it's decent weight it worked great for what we wanted. But after ordering it i went to hobby lobby and they had an equally nice one if not heavier for cheaper so that was bummer. If you live near a hobby lobby look there in the knob and hinge section and use a coupon or wait till they are 50% off and save yourself some money . If you don't, this one is nice and cheap for what is on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wall Mounted Bottle Opener
customer_reviews.text: I cannot honestly speak for ALL 4 of the openers that I received. But one of them cracks the glass under the cap when opening the bottle. I thought it was defective bottles the first two or three times, but now I know for sure that it is the opener itself that is defective. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Mylo Mylo

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you want to look like the joker
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple bottle break on me while using this to open beers. I thought it may have been the brand, so I tried another... Same issue. I think the mouth of it is too large and engulfs the glass bottle as well as the cap.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Vintage look, quality material
customer_reviews.text: The bottle openers were perfect for beer totes I made for Christmas presents. I installed them on 3/4" thick poplar wood. The screws were just a hair too long, so I needed to nip off about 1/16" so they would not poke through the back of the wood. Otherwise the screws look great as they are the same color as the openers.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: For looks only!
customer_reviews.text: Package was supposed to have a quantity of 3 in it, but only one came in the package. Also opener is sturdy made, and attractive, but not very functional. The opener will open bottles, but because of the design it is made to, it spews beverage everywhere when opening a bottle. The most aggravating thing is I contacted the seller iPihsius but they did nothing to correct the shipment error. I then contacted Amazon and they refunded the order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle openers.
customer_reviews.text: Used these along with some scrap wood to make some wall mount bottle openers/cap catchers. Opener itself works good and I was specifically looking for that rustic look
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Love these openers
customer_reviews.text: These are great I have them all over the place now, and nobody in my house drinks beer. Workbench, wall, cooler, picnic table, anywhere I thought someone would enjoy a beverage. I wish it had more, I don't need them at all, but I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Gilanyi

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this opener since September thinking it just needed a break-in period but no such luck. It still breaks the tip of the bottle as it pulls off the cap, thereby leaving shards of glass in the bottle. You could probably file the casting around the opener but that would take more time than it’s worth and besides I paid for an opener that is supposed to remove caps, not break bottle tops! FIX THIS OR GET IT OFF AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: daniel reimer

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I don't get easily irritated and I think this may be my first Amazon review ever, but this is junk. Do not buy. It breaks the glass off of the top of the bottles as you try to open them. It seems like there are plenty of good reviews of this product, so maybe I just got a lemon, but this product went into the trash after I wasted several beers to make sure I wasn't doing something weird or wrong.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: great outdoor kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: Gifted these along with the bear cast iron bottle opener to a friend of mine, look awesome in his farm house outdoor kitchen. Totally would recommend to have them for everyone who want to mount them in & around their outdoor kitchen and never have to look for another bottle opener.
customer_reviews.author: muhammad

customer_reviews.title: This item breaks bottles instead of opening them
customer_reviews.text: Kept chipping the top of all our beer bottles, we already took it down. Melted the metal into a new sword. Ready for battle now at least
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this multiple times. When I throw parties everyone used it, and it still is just as durable. I love it !!

customer_reviews.title: Read the description!!
customer_reviews.text: These work fine so far, but the description is COMEDIC GOLD. It sounds like some Chinese guy who wrote the description in Mandrin, threw it in Google Translate and called it a day. 10/10! Go read the description!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for something that looks old but is new this is it. Very sturdy and worked perfect for our project.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Bad opening angle beware it will make a mess!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price, Loved the quality.. but when you put the bottle in to open it, it is almost completely horizontal and will spray you and make a mess! You can very slowly, and very carefully open a bottle with this opener, but in my opinion it is way too much effort and should be a snap. I am returning for a refund..
customer_reviews.author: michael artymowicz

customer_reviews.title: Nice rustic addition for the backyard
customer_reviews.text: We installed it on outdoor lumber, so we had to use different screws as the ones provided were too small for our purpose. Looks exactly like the picture. The installation was simple. The use as a bottle opener is straightforward. It's a great addition to any outdoor setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rustic
customer_reviews.text: Turned San old whiskey barrel into a mini bar. This was perfect!

customer_reviews.title: bottle opener

customer_reviews.title: Nice rustic bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband for our 6th wedding anniversary (iron) to attach to a wood plaque. It's very well made and looks rustic. I appreciate that it came with matching screwes!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Decoration ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Broke every. single. bottle. At first I thought it was operator error by my husband but I tried it with 3 different brand bottles and they all broke on me as well. I’ve never had this issue with any other opener of this style.
customer_reviews.author: Endout

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle every time!
customer_reviews.text: These not only pull the cap off but also the top 1/4 of glass around the top of the neck. The opener catches the glass lip and cracks it off. I would not buy them again! I think they were molded wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kjuikjel

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Used for a sign request I had..worked perfectly and inexpensive. Pleasantly surprised it also came with the screws.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good solid opener! Bought the 3 pack to put one in a few spots including the outside kitchen on my camper!! 😃

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I only needed 3 but having an extra is always good. 1 for the kitchen, 1 for the garage and 1 for my office.

customer_reviews.title: The opener works well and they have that wonderful rustic finish I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could put them on old barn wood and give them to my sons as gifts. The opener works well and they have that wonderful rustic finish I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks the tops off beer bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these around my garage. Unfortunately all of them will break the glass lip off all my beer bottles! Tested with different bottle shapes. The only way not to break your bottles is to carefully and slowly remove the lid, something that should not be happening when you want your suds right now!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the screws
customer_reviews.text: The screws are garbage. I worked on a piece for two days only to have the screws to break off in the wood when I went to mount the opener. I predrilled it and everything.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these

In order to actually open a beer bottle you have to bend the bottle too much so when the lid comes off a lot of beer splashes out ! However really nice looking and good sturdy quality. Very fast delivery and excellent customer service must be mentioned!!

product_meta.title: Wall Mounted Bottle Opener Rustic Farmhouse Cast Iron with Screws by iPihsius - Set of 3
feature_bullets: Reliable pal. Fine craft. Two optional styles. Faux rustic iron and shiny industrial alloy. Simple, strong and durable vintage bottle openers.
Steady Easy Use. Pry and remove bottle caps. It is easier and quicker with single hand. Why two?
Go as you please. Mounted on anywhere you like and make DIY openers. Outside deck, on the porch, in the garage, by the pool, equipping a beer carrier, under a bar, on a chair leg, desk leg, etc.

Icy bottle in hand; desperated to drink; only to find your openers are taken away by mystical oriental power AGAIN? Take 3 or 4 iPihsius openers mounted in your house, and there is nothing this mystical power can do.

Come with screws for mounting. Suggestion: Mounted on vertical walls/woods or on where the upper part of opener is leaned out. Do not mount on slopes. Liquid spills out or sheds when bottles were opened upside down.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,074 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
